page.title: 19ACTIVITIES
page.content: People within our block are fairly well catered for with regard to activities and{clubs. }The main provision for Roseworth Estate is centred at Kiora Community Centre where all ages are considered.There are Scouts,Cubs, Guides,Brownies,Jazz Band,dancing classes, Luncheon Club for the elderly, youth club and football teams to name but a few.There is a Workingman's Club along Junction Road and in Thorpe Thewles there is a Women's Institute,badminton,dances and whist drives all held in the{Village {Hall.}On Junction Road a{Further {Education Centre}for adults provides facilities for many night school activities,{sports,}and is a centre for Adult Literacy.Whether you live in Roseworth Estate or Thorpe Thewles there is always something to do and you need never become bored.
